metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33096 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper isolation of shared resources in network on chip for the Intel(R) 82599 Ethernet Controllers and Adapters may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

notes.Note: cascardo> Intel has guidance to address this, no driver update

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
